* PushJob  a job that is initiated from a source Publication and which pushes the translation to one or more target Publications that are lower down in the BluePrint.

parameters.name: forAllUsers
parameters.description:
When forAllUsers is set to false (the default value), the results will be filtered on Assignee or Owner depending on the activity instance state:
Activity Instances in Assigned State are returned if they are assigned to the Current User or any groups of the Current User.
Activity Instances in other Activity States are returned if they are owned by the Current User
<para>
When forAllUsers is set to true, the results are filtered by security instead.
Only the Activity Instances on which the current user has Workflow Management rights (or system administration privileges) are returned.
</para>

AbstractBatchPublishRequest.description: Represents the abstract request for the publish/un-publish batch operations.

Priority.description: Gets or sets the priority of the publish action. Passing null will use the priority from the Publication Target.

TargetIdsOrPurposes.description: Gets or sets the collection of identifiers representing Publication Targets, Target Types or purposes of the "TargetType" to publish to. This cannot contain a combination of them.

AccessControlEntry.description:
Represents an entry in an Access Control List, which is used to restrict access to containers.
            An Access Control Entry specifies which Permissions and/or Rights a given "Trustee" has.
            Permissions and Rights can either be Allowed, Denied or Implicit Denied.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'AccessControlEntry' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

AllowedPermissions.description:
Gets or sets the Permissions that the "Trustee" is allowed to have.
            This property works in conjunction with "DeniedPermissions".
            The following combinations are possible:
               Allowed: Allowed bit set, Denied bit not set
               Implicit Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit not set
               Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit set

AllowedRights.description:
Gets or sets the Rights that the "Trustee" is allowed to have.
            This property works in conjunction with "DeniedRights".
            The following combinations are possible:
               Allowed: Allowed bit set, Denied bit not set
               Implicit Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit not set
               Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit set

DeniedPermissions.description:
Gets or sets the Permissions that the "Trustee" is denied to have.
            This property works in conjunction with "AllowedPermissions".
            The following combinations are possible:
               Allowed: Allowed bit set, Denied bit not set
               Implicit Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit not set
               Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit set

DeniedRights.description:
Gets or sets the Rights that the "Trustee" is denied to have.
            This property works in conjunction with "AllowedRights".
            The following combinations are possible:
               Allowed: Allowed bit set, Denied bit not set
               Implicit Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit not set
               Denied: Allowed bit not set, Denied bit set

Trustee.description: Gets the Trustee (User or Group) which the Access Control Entry applies to.

AccessControlList.description: Represents an Access Control List which is used to restrict access to a container.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'AccessControlList' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

AccessControlEntries.description:
Gets access to Access Control Entries which the Access Control List contains.This list doesn't support delta update. So in order to add new entry, original list should be extended with that new entry, not overwritten. 
            If AccessControlEntries are modified on organizational item which is not permissions inheritance root, changes will be silently ignored.

ExpiresAt.description: Gets the expiration date and time in UTC format for this token.

InheritedSystemPrivileges.description: Gets a dictionary containing "SystemPrivilege" and link "Group" associations.

Signature.description: Gets a signature value for this token to prevent modifying any of its properties outside of the CM system.

Activity.description: Abstract base class for the data of Activities.

Assignee.description: Gets the User or Group to which the Activity is assigned.

AssignmentDate.description: Gets the most recent assigned/re-assigned date and time in UTC of the Activity.Initially the Assignment date and Creation date are the same, upon re-assign of the activity this is updated to time the operation was performed.

DueDate.description: Gets or sets the due date and time in UTC for finishing activity.

FinishDate.description: Gets the date and time in UTC at which the Activity has been finished.

FinishMessage.description: Gets the message provided by the User who finished the Activity.

Owner.description:
Gets the User who owns the Activity.
            The User who starts an Activity becomes the owner of the Activity.
            Ownership can be transferred to someone else using the ReAssign method.
            Only the owner can Finish the Activity.

Performers.description:
Gets the Users that are performing or have performed the Activity.
            This property is an aggregation of the Work Items' Owner property.
            This property can be empty collection if the Activity was never started, and hence the Work Item(s) were never owned by anybody.
            
            Activity can have multiple Performers because each Work Item can be owned/performed by someone else.

Position.description: Gets the position of the current Activity within the Process.

PrimarySubject.description:
Gets or set the Primary Subject of the Activity.
            This property is introduced in Tridion Sites 10.0 (V2 API)

Process.description: Gets the Process which contains the Activity.

StartDate.description: Gets the date and time in UTC at which the Activity was started (for the first time).

SuspendDate.description: Gets the date and time in UTC at which the automated Activity was suspended or failed (the last time).

WorkItems.description:
Gets the Work Items involved in the Activity.
            An Activity contains a Work Item for each Content Manager item ("subject") involved in the Activity.

ActivityConstraints.description:
Defines the constraints of an Activity Instance.
            

Members:
* `None` - 
            Does not have any constraints.
            
* `DenyBundleMetadataEditing` - 
            Denies editing Metadata of a Bundle in workflow.
            
* `DenySubjectEditing` - 
            Denies editing Subject in workflow. 
            
* `DenyAddRemoveWorkItem` - 
            Denies adding/removing work items to/from the Activity.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

ActivityDecisionFinishInfo.description: Represents the data required for finishing an Decision Activity.

NextActivity.description: Gets or sets the next Activity Instance in the decision.

ActivityDefinition.description: Abstract base class for the data of the Activity Definitions. Part of the Process Definition.

ActivityConstraints.description: Gets or sets the constraints of an activity.

Assignee.description:
Gets or sets the User or Group to which the Workflow activity will be assigned.
            Depending on the character of activity this property has some limitations:
            Assignee of the first activity in the process might not be set explicitly. In that case activity will be assigned to everyone.Automatic activities (activities with "TridionActivityDefinition.Script" property set) should be assigned to the workflow agent user (Id of this user can be found in Content Manager configuration under the 'Automatic Trustee ID' setting in the Workflow settings node).
            If this property is not set or set to null, the value depends on the kind of activity:
            For normal activity the everyone group will be assigned.For decision activity a performer of the previous activity will be assigned.For automatic activity (activity with "TridionActivityDefinition.Script" property set) the workflow agent user will be assigned.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the Activity Definition.

ProcessDefinition.description: Gets or sets the Workflow Process Definition that contains this activity.

ActivityFinishInfo.description: Represents the data required for finishing an Activity.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ActivityFinishInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Message.description: Gets or sets the finish message for the current Activity.

NextActivityDueDate.description: Gets or sets the due date in UTC to be used for the next Activity Instance.

NextActivityTitle.description:
Gets or sets the title to be used for the next Activity Instance.
            By default, Activity Instances get an auto-generated title consisting of their position and the title of their Activity Definition.
            However, it is also possible to let Activity Instance have a custom title.
            Such a custom title can be specified when finishing the previous Activity using this property.

NextAssignee.description:
Gets or sets the assignee (override) for the next Activity.
            Typically, the assignee is specified on the Activity Definition and hence it is not required to set this property.
            This property can be used to override the assignee as specified in the Process/Activity Definition.

ActivityFinishRequest.description: Represents the data required for finishing an Activity.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ActivityFinishRequest' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Message.description: Gets or sets the finish message for the current Activity.

NextActivityDueDate.description: Gets or sets the due date in UTC to be used for the next Activity Instance.

NextActivityTitle.description:
Gets or sets the title to be used for the next Activity Instance.
            By default, Activity Instances get an auto-generated title consisting of their position and the title of their Activity Definition.
            However, it is also possible to let Activity Instance have a custom title.
            Such a custom title can be specified when finishing the previous Activity using this property.

NextAssignee.description:
Gets or sets the assignee (override) for the next Activity.
            Typically, the assignee is specified on the Activity Definition and hence it is not required to set this property.
            This property can be used to override the assignee as specified in the Process/Activity Definition.

ActivityHistory.description: Representing data of the Activity History. This is the part of "ProcessHistory".

ActivityDefinitionTitle.description: Gets the Activity Definition Title of the Activity.

ActivityType.description: Gets the Activity Type related to current "ActivityHistory".

ApprovalStatus.description: Gets the Approval Status of the Activity History.

ActivityInstance.description: Represents the data of an Activity Instance: a current Activity which is part of a Process Instance (V2).

ActivityConstraints.description: Gets the constraints of this activity (V2).

ActivityState.description: Gets the state of the Activity Instance (V2).

ActivityInstanceBase.description: Represents the data of an Activity Instance: a current Activity which is part of a Process Instance.

ActivityDefinition.description: Gets the Activity Definition on which the Activity Instance is based.

ApprovalStatus.description: Gets the Approval Status for this Activity Instance.

IsExpirationExecution.description:
Gets or sets value, indicated whether this activity expired or not.
            This property is used by Workflow Agent while expiring the activity.

ProcessDefinition.description:
Gets the Process Definition on which the Activity Instance is based.
            This property is introduced in Tridion Sites 10.0 (V2 API)

ResumeBookmark.description: Gets the resume bookmark for suspended automated activities.During suspending of activity user can specify "ResumeBookmark" object. With its help script execution can be started in future from specific place, but not from the very beginning.

SuspendOrFailReason.description: Gets the reason why this Activity was suspended or failed.

WorkflowType.description:
Gets the workflow type of the Process which contains this Activity.
            This property is introduced in Tridion Sites 10.0 (V2 API)

ActivityState.description:
Defines a state of an Activity.
            

Members:
* `Assigned` - 
            The Activity is assigned to the User or Group.
            
* `Started` - 
            The Activity is started by a User.
            
* `Failed` - 
            The Activity is failed.
            
* `Finished` - 
            The Activity is finished. 
            
* `Suspended` - 
            The Activity is suspended.
            
* `WaitingForWorkflowAgent` - 
            The Activity is waiting for execution by Workflow Agent.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

ActivityType.description:
Defines a type of an Activity.
            

Members:
* `Normal` - 
            Normal activity.
            
* `Decision` - 
            Decision activity.

AddedItem.description:
Represents an Item added to a {Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.TranslationJob}.The item added to a Translation Job is not necessarily the item that is send for translation. For example,
            if a Page is added without specifying the TranslateParentItems flag in the
            , the Components on the Page are included in the Translation Job but
            the Page itself will not.To change the items included in the Translation Job directly, use a Tridion Sites event subscription with the  event arguments.

IdRef.description: Gets the URI of the added item.

Title.description: Gets the title of the Tridion item.

ItemTypeWithSubtype.description: Gets a string that identifies the Tridion Item type.

ResolveOptions.description: Gets or sets the {Tridion.TranslationManager.DomainModel.ResolveOptions} specifying it it is the Item itself, it's child Items or both that should be translated.

ApiStatus.description: Represents the status of the CoreService REST API.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ApiStatus' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ApiVersion.description: Gets the current version of the CoreService REST API.

ServerTime.description: Gets the server time at the request moment.

ApplicationData.description: Represents application-specific data which can be stored system-wide (global) or associated with any identifiable object.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ApplicationData' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ApplicationId.description:
Gets or sets the application identifier.
            This identifier must be unique across all applications. Consider using a GUID or URI.
            This value might be case-sensitive or case-insensitive depending upon system and database configuration. Hence, it is wise to consider this value as case-sensitive, and not create two different Ids differing only in their case.

Data.description: Gets or sets the binary data.

IsInherited.description:
Gets the status informing whether this application data is inherited from parent item.
            The value of this property will be false for "ApplicationData" attached to all Non Repository Local Objects and Global Application Data.

ManagedLinks.description:
Gets or sets managed links (reserved for future use).
            The "Data" property is simply a binary data of which the CM Kernel doesn't have any knowledge.
            Hence, the CM Kernel cannot automatically provide link management functionality on links to TCM items contained in some way in the data.
            Link management will be provided in future versions of the CM Kernel by means of this property.
            This property is currently exposed merely to prevent a change to the data contract in the future when link management is provided.

OwningRepositoryId.description:
Gets the Id of the repository which owns this application data.
            The owning publication of an application data is either the context publication in which it is being read, or the owning publication of the subject item to which it is attached.
            The value of this property will be tcm:0-0-0 for "ApplicationData" attached to all Non Repository Local Objects and Global Application Data.

TypeId.description:
Gets or sets the type identifier which can be used to deserialize the binary "Data" into a structured data type.
            The type identifier can be any string. It doesn't have meaning to the Content Manager system; it's merely intended to help applications
            store and retrieve application-specific data using structured types.

ApprovalStatus.description: Represents a data of the Approval Status.

IsDeleted.description:
Gets a value indicating whether the Approval Status is deleted.
            If an Approval Status is deleted, it is not physically removed, but only flagged as deleted
            (and therefore suppressed from the list of Approval Statuses).

Position.description:
Gets or sets the position of this Approval Status in the list of the Approval Statuses.
            The list of Approval Statuses is ordered, because Publication Targets can have a minimal Approval Status:
            Approval Statuses with a Position lower than this minimal approval status won't be publishable.

BasicVersionInfo.description: Basic version information about any Identifiable Object.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BasicVersionInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

CreationDate.description: Gets or sets the date and time in UTC at which the item was created.

RevisionDate.description: Gets or sets the date and time in UTC at which the item was last modified.

Batch.description: Represents the data of a Batch. Defines batch operations and additional info related to batch invocation.

NumberOfDoneOperations.description: Gets the count of done operations.

Operations.description: Gets or sets the list of operations of the current batch.

Performer.description: Gets the performer of the batch operation.

StartAt.description: Gets or sets the time in UTC, when the batch operation must be started.

TotalNumberOfOperations.description: Gets the total number of operations.

BatchAutoClassifyRequest.description: Represents the request for the auto-classify batch operation.

BatchCheckInRequest.description: Represents the request for the check-in batch operation.

RemovePermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI.
It is removed when the user performs an explicit checkin action in the UI.
Available values:
* True  removes the permanent lock after the check-in action.
* False  does not remove the lock after the check-in action, such as when the item is still being edited.

UserComment.description: Gets or sets the user comment for this item. If null the user comment is not changed.

BatchCheckOutRequest.description: Represents the request for the check-out batch operation.

SetPermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI and removed when the user performs an explicit checkin action in the UI.
Checkout or checkin actions without permanent lock effectively do nothing if item was checked out with permanent lock.
Available values:
* True  sets a permanent lock that will be removed only when the user performs an explicit check-in action.
* False  sets no lock, which means the check-in and check-out actions effectively do nothing.

BatchClassifyOrUnClassifyRequest.description: Represents the request for the classify or un-classify batch operation.

KeywordIds.description: Gets or sets the collection of Keyword identifiers to classify/un-classify the item.

BatchCopyOrMoveRequest.description: Represents the request for the copy or move batch operation.

DestinationId.description: The identifier of the "ContentManagement.OrganizationalItem" where the copy should be created.

BatchCopyRequest.description: Represents the request for the copy batch operation.

MakeUnique.description: Specifies whether a unique title should be generated if an item with the same title already exists in the destination.

BatchDeleteTaxonomyNodeRequest.description: Represents the request for the delete taxonomy node batch operation.

TaxonomyNodeMode.description: Specifies how to handle the children of the deleted taxonomy node.

BatchFinishActivityRequest.description: Represents the request for the finish activity batch operations.

ActivityFinishInfo.description: Gets or sets the data object that specifies some parameters for the Finish operation.

BatchForceFinishRequest.description: Represents the request for the force finish batch operations.

ApprovalStatusId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the Approval Status which will be set to all Subjects of the related Work Items.

BatchOperation.description: Provides information about batch operation on the list of subjects.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BatchOperation' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Operation.description: Gets or sets the operation name.

Parameters.description: Gets the additional parameters for invoking operation.

Statuses.description: Gets the collection, which contains information about performing operation on each subject.

SubjectLinks.description: Gets the subjects on which current operation must be performed.

BatchOperationCreationResult.description: The result of the creation of the batch operation.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BatchOperationCreationResult' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

BatchId.description: Reference for reading batch operation which has been created.

BatchOperationRequest.description: Represents the request for the batch operation.

BatchOperationRequestBase.description: Represents the abstract request for the batch operation.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BatchOperationRequestBase' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
$type.example: <Set to a class name inheriting from 'BatchOperationRequestBase'>

ItemIds.description: Gets or sets the identifier of items on which the current operation must be performed.

BatchOperationState.description:
The state of the batch operation.
            

Members:
* `NotStarted` - 
            Batch operation wasn't started yet.
            
* `Success` - 
            Batch operation was successfully finished.
            
* `Warning` - 
            Batch operation was finished with warning.
            
* `Error` - 
            Batch operation wasn't finished due to an error.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

BatchOperationStatus.description: Contains information about performing batch operation on concrete subject.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BatchOperationStatus' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

CreatedItems.description:
Gets the list of the Ids of the created items during batch operation.
            The property is used for publish/unpublish batch operations only and contains Ids of created publication transactions.
            
            For the other batch operations the property is empty.

ErrorCode.description: Gets the error code in case of error during operation (warning, error).

Information.description: Gets the information about an operation being performed (warning, error).

State.description: Gets the state of the current batch operation.

ValidationErrors.description: Gets the list of "ValidationError" which were raised while performing an operation.

ValidationWarnings.description: Gets the list of "ValidationWarning" which were raised while performing an operation.

BatchPromoteDemoteRequest.description: Represents the request for the promote or demote batch operations.

DestinationRepositoryId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the parent/child repository where item should be promoted/demoted to.

Instruction.description: Gets or sets the instruction to specify how operation will be executed.

BatchPublishRequest.description: Represents the request for the publish batch operation.

PublishInstruction.description: Gets or sets the instruction for the publish action.

BatchReAssignActivityRequest.description: Represents the request for the re-assign activity batch operation.

NewAssigneeId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the User or Group to re-assign to.

BatchReClassifyRequest.description: Represents the request for the re-classify batch operation.

KeywordIdsToAdd.description: Gets or sets the collection of Keyword identifiers to add to the item.

KeywordIdsToRemove.description: Gets or sets the collection of Keyword identifiers to remove from the item.

BatchSuspendActivityRequest.description: Represents the request for the suspend activity batch operation.

Reason.description: Gets or sets the reason of the suspending activity.

BatchSwitchUserEnabledStateRequest.description: Represents the request for the batch operation that changes the enabled state of users.

IsEnabled.description: Gets or sets a new value for "User.IsEnabled" property.

BatchUndoCheckOutRequest.description: Represents the request for the undo check-out batch operation.

RemovePermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI.
It is removed when the user performs an explicit undo checkout action in the UI.
Available values:
* True  removes the permanent lock after the check-in action.
* False  does not remove the lock after the check-in action, such as when the item is still being edited.

BatchUnPublishRequest.description: Represents the request for the un-publish batch operation.

UnPublishInstruction.description: Gets or sets the instruction for the un-publish action.

BinaryContent.description: Represents the binary content of a Multimedia Component or a Template.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BinaryContent' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

BlobId.description: Gets the ID of the binary in the permanent content storage.

ExternalBinaryUri.description: Gets or sets the URI for the external binary content.

Filename.description:
Gets or sets the file name of the binary content.
            For backward compatibility purposes, it is allowed to set this property to the external binary URI.
            This will effectively set the "ExternalBinaryUri" property instead.

IsExternal.description:
Gets or sets whether the binary content is stored internally or externally.
            If the binary content is stored externally, the "Filename" property
            should contain the URL where the binary content can be retrieved.

MimeType.description:
Gets a value indicating the MimeType of the binary content.
            Getting the MimeType from the MultiMediaType property requires an extra call.

Size.description: Gets the size of the binary data.

UploadFromFile.description:
Gets or sets the uploaded filename of the binary content.
            If the binary content is stored externally, it should not have value.
            If the binary content is stored internally, it should contain filepath.

Url.description: Url that can be used to navigate and get a binary.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BinaryUploadResponse' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

MultimediaType.description: Link to MultimediaType for uploaded file.

BlueprintHierarchyResponse.description: Response model for Blueprint Hierarchy request

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BlueprintHierarchyResponse' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Items.description: Collection of Items in the blueprint hierarchy

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BlueprintInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

IsLocalized.description: Gets or sets whether the item is localized in the current context Publication.

IsShared.description: Gets or sets whether the item is shared in the current context Publication.

OwningRepository.description:
Gets or sets the Repository in which the item physically resides.
            For shared items, the "context Repository" and "owning Repository" will be different.

PrimaryBluePrintParentItem.description:
Gets or sets the link to a master item (an item in the top of the BluePrint chain, where it was originally created).
             For shared and localized items returns an originally item on the top of the BluePrint tree.
            
            For local items returns an item itself.

BlueprintNode.description: Represent blueprint node when retrieving the hierarchy.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'BlueprintNode' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Children.description: Links to immediate child context repositories.

ContextRepositoryId.description: The Id of the context repository.

Parents.description: Links to immediate parent context repositories.

Bundle.description: Represents a Bundle which is used to group Repository Local Objects for Release Management purposes.

Items.description: Gets or sets the collection of links to items in the Bundle.

BusinessProcessType.description:
Represents a Business Process Type: defines a type of (publishing) Business Process, including a set of publishing Target Types and workflows.
            It is a root organizational item. Title must be unique across its blueprint hierarchy; like all other root organizational items.
            
            Metadata Schema, Bundle Schemas and Target Types of a Business Process Type are not localizable.
            AccessControlListData and IsPermissionsInheritanceRoot cannot be set for a Business Process Type.
            GetList and GetListXml return the associated "BundleSchemas".
            
            When reading a Business Process Type the associated Target Types are returned without its Access Control List, if that information is needed,
            then, the Business Process Type should be loaded with LoadFlags.Expanded.

BundleSchemas.description:
Gets or sets the bundle schemas which are applicable for this Business Process Type.
            This property is not localizable.
            
            The collection of Bundle Schemas is used to determine the workflow that will be used in the Publication.
            
            This property can only be set by the user with Business Process Type Management rights.

CdTopologyTypeId.description:
Gets or sets the topology type id of the Business Process Type.
            This property can not be null or empty.
            
            CdTopologyType with specified "CdTopologyTypeId" must exist in the associated Topology Manager. 
            The endpoint address of the associated Topology Manager is stored in the environment variable with name "TRIDION_TTM_SERVICEURL".
            
            This property is not localizable.
            
            The value of this property is the id of the topology type from the associated Tridion Topology Manager.

Description.description:
Gets or sets the description of the Business Process Type.
            The description can be used for informational purposes.

TargetTypes.description:
Gets or sets the associated Target Types of this Business Process Type.
            This property is not localizable.
            
            The collection of the Target Types is used to determine the Content Delivery Environment using Topology Manager.
            
            In order to change the Access Control List additional Permission Management rights are required in the context publication.

Capabilities.description: Represents information about available capabilities and features

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'Capabilities' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

EnabledFeatures.description:
Symbolic names of enabled features.
            Features can be added, enabled or disabled in "tridion.featureToggling" section in Tridion.ContentManager.config file.

Category.description: Represents the data of a Category of Keywords.

AllowedParentCategories.description:
Get access to the allowed parent Categories.
            Keywords from this Category are allowed to have parent Keywords from the allowed parent categories.
            Current implementation allows only one parent category. By default when no parent category is set the category itself is added as allowed parent category. 
            Reassign with a new collection when changing or setting a new parent.
            To remove parent categories reassign with a new collection which contains the Category itself.

Description.description:
Gets or sets the description of the Category.
            The description can be used for informational purposes.

IsTaxonomyRoot.description: Gets whether the Category is a root Category (i.e. it has no allowed parent Categories other than itself).

KeywordMetadataSchema.description: Gets or sets the metadata Schema for the Keywords in this Category.

UseForIdentification.description:
Gets or sets indicating whether the Category can be used for Taxonomy identification.
            Specifies whether to enforce title uniqueness in the whole Blueprint structure on components that are classified with keywords from this Category.
            For example, Components can be classified by a Keyword if there is no other Component with the same title classified with this Keyword.
            Can be configurable only on root Categories.
            Title uniqueness check is performed on a Component with fields that contains a Keyword from the Category with UseForIdentification set to true.

UseForNavigation.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the taxonomy in this Category can be published.

XmlName.description:
Gets or sets the XML (type) name of the Category.
            Each publication contains a "Categories XSD" in which all Categories and their Keywords
            are defined. In this Categories XSD, each Category is represented as a complex type with this name.
            The XML name is subject to the restrictions specified for type names in XML Schemas:
            The first character must be a letter or an underscore.Following characters may be letters, digits, underscores, dashes or dots.

CheckInRequest.description: Removes permanent lock and creates a new version of the item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'CheckInRequest' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

RemovePermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI.
It is removed when the user performs an explicit checkin action in the UI.
Available values:
* True  removes the permanent lock after the check-in action.
* False  does not remove the lock after the check-in action, such as when the item is still being edited.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'CheckOutRequest' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

SetPermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI and removed when the user performs an explicit checkin action in the UI.
Checkout or checkin actions without permanent lock effectively do nothing if item was checked out with permanent lock.
Available values:
* True  sets a permanent lock that will be removed only when the user performs an explicit check-in action.
* False  sets no lock, which means the check-in and check-out actions effectively do nothing.

ClaimMapping.description: Abstract base class representing the data of a mapping between a Claim and a TCM Group.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ClaimMapping' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
$type.example: <Set to a class name inheriting from 'ClaimMapping'>

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the mapping.

Group.description: Gets or sets the Group for which the mapping exists.

ClassificationDetail.description: Classsification details for a particular field.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ClassificationDetail' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Category.description: Link to the category that was used for Classification.

FieldPath.description: Path to the field in the data.

IsMetadataField.description: Indicates whether the field is a "metadata" field.

Keywords.description: The keywords that apply to the field.

ClassificationInfo.description: Contains classification information for an Item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ClassificationInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Component.description: Represents the data of a Component: a generic holder of content and metadata.

ApprovalStatus.description: Gets the Approval Status of the item.

BinaryContent.description:
Gets or sets access to the Component's binary content.
            Only Multimedia Components (i.e. Component based on a Multimedia Schema) have binary content.
            For "normal" Components, which have XML content instead, this property is null.

ComponentType.description:
Gets the type of the Component (Normal or Multimedia).
            This type is derived from the "Schema" on which the Component is based.
            Components with type "ComponentType.Multimedia" are often referred to as "Multimedia Components".

Content.description: Gets or sets the content of the Component.

IsBasedOnMandatorySchema.description: Gets whether the Component is based on a Mandatory Schema

IsBasedOnTridionWebSchema.description: Gets whether the Component is based on a Tridion Web Schema

Schema.description: Gets or sets the Schema for the Component's content and metadata.

WorkflowInfo.description: Sets workflow-related information for the item.

ComponentLinkFieldDefinition.description: Represents a Component link field definition (in a Schema).

AllowedTargetSchemas.description:
Gets access to the allowed Schemas for the linked Components.
            An empty list means that the target Schema is not constrained.

AllowMultimediaLinks.description: Gets or sets whether links to Multimedia Components are allowed.

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the Component used as default field's value.

ComponentPresentation.description: Represents a Component Presentation: essentially a combination of a Component and a Component Template.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ComponentPresentation' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ComponentTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the Component Template.
            This property is optional since Tridion Sites 9.5 if data publishing is enabled.

Conditions.description:
Gets or sets the (Target Group) conditions.
            If conditions are specified for a Component Presentation, these are published as TCDL code.
            This TCDL code results in Content Delivery code that only renders the Component Presentation
            if the user falls in the given Target Groups.

ComponentPresentationConstraint.description: Base class for Component Presentation Constraints (specified in a Region Schema).

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ComponentPresentationConstraint' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ComponentTemplate.description: Represents a Component Template: a template used to render a Component into a Component Presentation.

AllowOnPage.description:
Gets or sets whether the Component Template may be used on a Page.
            This setting only applies to Component Templates which render "dynamic" Component Presentations.

ApprovalStatus.description:
Gets the approval status of the item.
            An object representing the approval status of the item or null if the item has not been part of a workflow process.

DynamicTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the "dynamic" part of the Component Template: an XSLT which is executed on the Content Delivery system.
            Only applicable if the "OutputFormat" is set to "XML Document".

IsRepositoryPublishable.description:
Gets or sets whether the Component Template renders "dynamic" Component Presentations.
            A "dynamic" Component Presentation is published separately instead of being embedded on a Page.

OutputFormat.description: Gets or sets the format of the rendered Component Presentation.

Priority.description:
Gets or sets the priority used for resolving Component links.
            The Priority is used by Content Delivery linking to resolve a Component link:
            if a Component is published on multiple Pages, then a choice has to be made to which Page
            the hyperlink should point.
            This decision is made based on the Priority of the Component Template used
            to render the Component: the hyperlink will point to the Page containing
            a Component Presentation with the highest priority.

TrackingCategories.description:
Gets access to the "tracking" Categories.
            When rendering a Component using the Component Template,
            code to increment "tracking keys" can get generated by the system.
            Which "tracking keys" will get incremented is determined by the Keywords
            attached to the Component and the Tracking Categories set on the Component Template:
            each Keyword attached to the Component which is part of one of the Tracking Categories
            will result in an associated "tracking key" increment.

WorkflowInfo.description: Gets workflow-related information for the item.

ComponentType.description:
Defines the subtype of a Component.
            

Members:
* `Normal` - A normal Component containing XML content.
* `Multimedia` - A Multimedia Component containing binary content.
* `Widget` - A widget Component - a dedicated variant of the normal Component.
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

Condition.description: Abstract base class for Conditions used in a Target Group definition.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'Condition' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
$type.example: <Set to a class name inheriting from 'Condition'>

Negate.description:
Gets or sets whether the condition should be negated.
            If a condition is negated, it means that it matches if the condition is NOT met.
            For example, a negated TargetGroupCondition matched on people that are NOT in the Target Group.

ConditionOperator.description:
Defines an operator used for comparison.
            

Members:
* `Equals` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is equal to the given condition value.
            
* `GreaterThan` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is greater than the given condition value.
            
* `LessThan` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is less than the given condition value.
            
* `NotEqual` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is not equal to the given condition value.
            
* `StringEquals` - 
            Compares if a string operand is equal to the given condition value.
            
* `Contains` - 
            Compares if a string operand contains the given condition value.
            
* `StartsWith` - 
            Compares if a string operand starts with the given condition value.
            
* `EndsWith` - 
            Compares if a string operand ends with the given condition value.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

CustomerCharacteristicCondition.description: Represents a condition on a Customer Characteristic (a named value in the user profile).

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the Customer Characteristic.

Negate.description: Gets or sets whether the condition should be negated.

Operator.description: Gets or sets the operator used for comparing the Customer Characteristic's value against the "Value" specified in the condition.

Value.description:
Gets or sets the value to compare the Customer Characteristic's value against.
            The type of comparison depends on the "Operator".

DateFieldDefinition.description: Represents a date field definition (in a Schema).

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

IsMaxValueExclusive.description: Gets or sets whether the specified maximum value is exclusive or inclusive.

IsMinValueExclusive.description: Gets or sets whether the specified minimum value is exclusive or inclusive.

List.description: Gets access to the list of allowed values.

MaxValue.description: Gets or sets the maximum value constraint.

MinValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value constraint.

Pattern.description: Gets or sets a regular expression pattern to constrain the value.

DateListDefinition.description: Provides information about whether/how to present a list of allowed date field values.

Entries.description: Gets access to the allowed values.

DecisionActivityFinishRequest.description: Represents the data required for finishing a decision Activity.

NextActivity.description: Gets or sets which Activity Definition should be used for the next Activity.

DeleteTaxonomyNodeMode.description:
Specifies what will happen to the child nodes of a Taxonomy node after that node's deletion.
            

Members:
* `DeleteBranch` - 
            Specifies that the entire branch of descendant nodes will be deleted, excluding nodes in child Publications.
            
* `DeleteBranchIncludeChildPublications` - 
            Specifies that the entire branch of descendants will be deleted, including nodes in child Publications.
            
* `RemoveParentFromChildren` - 
            Specifies that the deleted node will be removed from the children's parents.
            Children will become root if they have no other parents.
            If the children have other parents, those parents are preserved.
            
* `AssignChildrenToGrandparents` - 
            Specifies that the parents of the deleted node adopt the deleted node's children.
            If the children have other parents, those parents are preserved.

DeployerAction.description:
Represents the action the deployer needs to take.
            

Members:
* `Commit` - 
            The deployer should commit the transport package.
            
* `Wait` - 
            The deployer should wait to commit the transport package.
            
* `Abort` - 
            The deployer should abort the transport package.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

DirectoryGroupMapping.description: Represents the data of a mapping between a Directory Service Group or Subtree and a TCM Group.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the mapping.

DirectoryServiceName.description: Gets or sets the Directory Service name to match on.

Group.description: Gets or sets the Group for which the mapping exists.

SearchDN.description: Gets or sets the Distinguished Name (DN) of the Group or Subtree to match on.

SearchType.description: Gets or sets the search type: either Subtree or Group.

DirectorySearchType.description:
Search types for the Directory Group Mapping.
            

Members:
* `Subtree` - 
            Search in the given subtree.
            
* `Group` - 
            Search in the given group.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

DynamicVersionInfo.description: Represents information about the dynamic version of a Versioned Item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'DynamicVersionInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Revision.description: Gets or sets the last revision counter.

RevisionDate.description: Gets or sets the date/time at which the item was last modified (saved).

Revisor.description: Gets or sets link to user who did last revision (last save action).

EmbeddedRegion.description: Represents the data object of an Embedded Region.

ComponentPresentations.description: Gets or sets the collection of Component Presentations.

Regions.description:
Gets or sets the collection of nested Regions.
            The collection can be modified according to the following rules.
            If the "RegionSchema" is set, the structure of the regions must adhere to the definition specified by that schema.
            If the schema is not set, there are no restrictions and the regions can be added or changed in any fashion.

EmbeddedSchemaFieldDefinition.description: Represents an embedded schema field definition (in a Schema).

EmbeddedSchema.description: Gets or sets the Link to SchemaData that defines the embedded fields.

ErrorDetails.description: Provides details for errors occuring while sending or retrieving {Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.TranslationJob}s.

ExceptionDetails.description: Gets the exception details for the error.

JobId.description: Gets the Id of the Translation Job, or 0 if the error is not associated with a specific job.

JobTitle.description: Gets the title of the Translation Job, or null if the error is not associated with a specific job.

Severity.description: Gets the severity of the error.

SourceLanguageId.description: Gets the id of the source language, or null if the error is not associated with a specific source language.

TargetLanguageId.description: Gets the id of the target language, or null if the error is not associated with a specific target language.

TcmItemCurrentTargetTitle.description: Gets the current title of the target Item, or null of the error is not associated with a specific target Item.

TcmItemNewTargetTitle.description:
Gets the title the Item as it is retrieved by from the translation management system, or null if the error is not associated with a
specific target Item.

TcmItemSourceTitle.description: Gets the title of the source Item, or null if the error is not associated with a specific source Item.

TcmItemSourceUri.description: Gets the TCM URI of the source Item, or tcm:0-0-0 if the item is not associated with a specific source item.

TcmItemTargetUri.description: Gets the TCM URI of the target Item, or tcm:0-0-0 if the item is not associated with a specific source item.

TmsItemId.description: Gets the id of the item in TMS, or null if the error is not associated with a specific TMS Job.

TmsJobId.description: Gets the id of the TMS Translation Job, or null if the error is not associated with a specific TMS job.

ErrorSeverity.description:
Indicates the severity of an error sending or retrieving a Translation Job.
            

Members:
* `Info` - 
            Information.
            
* `Warning` - 
            Errors that can impact usability but does not impact sending or retrieving Items (for example old jobs not being deleted)
            
* `Error` - 
            Errors stopping Items from being send to translation or retrieved from translation.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

ErrorType.description:
Enum of load error types.
            

Members:
* `None` - 
            No error.
            
* `Error` - 
            General error.
            
* `SecurityError` - 
            User has no permissions to read an item.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

ExceptionDetails.description: Provides details about the <seealso cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the error reported in the <seealso cref="T:Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.ErrorDetails" />

ExceptionTypeName.description: Gets the type name of original exception.

InnerException.description: Gets the {Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.ExceptionDetails} for {System.Exception.InnerException}; or null if there is no inner exception.

LocalizedMessages.description: Gets a {System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2} containing the <seealso cref="P:Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.ExceptionDetails.Message" /> for each supported <seealso cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> using the {System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name} as the key.

ExpandableLink.description: Represents a link to an Identifiable Object which may contain the linked data.

ExtensionPropertyDictionary.description: Represents a collection of Extension Properties.

ExternalCategory.description: Represents an External Category (mapped to an external Taxonomy Management System).

DisplayType.description: Gets or sets display type of the External Category.

StubId.description: Gets or sets the Stub Category ID (TCM URI)

ExternalComponent.description: Represents a External Component: an item provided from external system.

DirectLinkToPublished.description: Gets or sets a direct link to a published rendition of the item.

DisplayType.description: Gets or sets display type of external container.

ExternalMetadata.description:
Gets or sets external metadata.
            Metadata that item has in external system.

ExternalMetadataSchemaFields.description:
Gets or sets external metadata schema fields.
            Schema for metadata that item has in external system.

StubId.description: Gets or sets the Stub Component ID (TCM URI)

ExternalContainer.description: Represents a External Container: a container provided from external system.

DisplayType.description: Gets or sets display type of external container.

ExternalKeyword.description: Represents an External Keyword (mapped to an external Taxonomy Management System).

AlternativeLabels.description: Gets or sets the alternative labels (synonyms)

DisplayType.description: Gets or sets display type of the External Keyword.

ExternalMetadata.description:
Gets or sets external metadata.
            Metadata that item has in external system.

ExternalMetadataSchemaFields.description:
Gets or sets external metadata schema fields.
            Schema for metadata that item has in external system.

HiddenLabels.description: Gets or sets the hidden labels

StubId.description: Gets or sets the Stub Keyword ID (TCM URI)

ExternalLinkFieldDefinition.description: Represents an external link field definition (in a Schema).

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

ExternalCreator.description: Gets or sets the name of the user who created the item in the external system.

ExternalRevisor.description: Gets or sets the name of the user who last modified the item in the external system.

FavoriteLink.description: Represents the link to a favorite item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'FavoriteLink' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

IdRef.description: Gets the TCM URI of the referenced item.

Title.description: Gets the title of the referenced item.

Path.description: Gets the path to the container where the referenced item is located.

FieldsDefinitionDictionary.description: Represents the set of Item Field Definitions grouped by the field definition name.

FieldsValueDictionary.description: Represents the set of field values grouped by the field name.

FinishActivityResult.description: Container of the next ActivityInstance in the workflow

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'FinishActivityResult' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

NextActivityInstance.description: The next activity in the workflow

Folder.description: Represents the data of a Folder: an item used to organize the items in a Repository.

IsActive.description:
Gets or sets the active state of the Folder. 
If the active state is set to false, the Folder and the items inside it cannot be published.
                Even if the active state is set to true, it is not enough for a Folder to be publishable;
                all of its ancestor Folders must also have the active state set to true for that to succeed.
                Default value is true.

IsActiveResolvedValue.description:
Gets a value indicating whether this Folder and its items can be published.
Returns true if the active state of this Folder and all of its ancestors is true.
Returns false if the active state of this Folder or any of its ancestors is false.
The individual active state of each Folder is represented by the property "IsActive".

IsLinkedSchemaMandatory.description:
Gets or sets whether the linked Schema is mandatory.
            If the linked Schema is not mandatory, it merely acts as a default Schema for new Components created in the Folder.
            If the linked Schema is mandatory, Components cannot be saved in the Folder unless they are based on this Schema.
            It is not possible to make the linked Schema mandatory if there are Components in the Folder based on another Schema.

LinkedSchema.description:
Gets or sets the linked Schema of the Folder.
            The linked Schema acts as default Schema for Components created in the Folder.
            It can also acts as mandatory Schema, if "IsLinkedSchemaMandatory" is set to true.
            In the latter case, Components cannot be saved in the Folder unless they are based on this Schema.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'FormattingFeatures' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

AccessibilityLevel.description: Gets or sets the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) setting that you choose, shows or hides buttons for the various WCAG levels.

DisallowedActions.description: Gets or sets the formatting actions that a user can not perform on text within the format area.

DisallowedStyles.description: Gets or sets the styles that a user can not apply to text within a format area.

DocType.description:
Gets or sets the rules that are applied to this format area when Components based on this Schema are validated.
You have the option of selecting "Strict" or "Transitional" document types.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'FrontendAddon' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'FrontendExtension' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

MainFile.description: Path to the entry point script file

FullVersionInfo.description: Full version info for Versioned Items.

CheckOutDate.description: Gets or sets the date/time at which the item was checked out.

CheckOutUser.description: Gets or sets the User who checked out the item.

IsNew.description: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the item is "new" (not checked in yet).

LastVersion.description: Gets or sets the last version number of this item.

LockType.description: Gets or sets the type of lock on the item (if any).

Revision.description: Gets or sets the revision number of this item.

Revisor.description: Gets or sets the User who last modified this item.

UserComment.description: Gets the comment set by the user during check-in of this item.

Version.description: Gets or sets the version number of this item.

Group.description: Represents a data of Group of Users.

ClaimMappings.description:
Gets or sets access to the Group's Claim Mappings.
            A specific kind of Claim Mapping is a Directory Group Mapping, 
            which is used to map the group to a Group or Subtree in a Directory Service.

DefaultGroupId.description:
Gets the Default Group Id.
            Determines the default Group id for current Group.

InheritedSystemPrivileges.description: Gets a dictionary containing "SystemPrivilege" and link "Group" associations.

Scope.description: Gets or sets access to the Group's scope (also known as "usage constraints"): the Repositories in which the Group can be used.

SystemPrivileges.description: Gets or sets a collection of "SystemPrivilege" assigned for this Group.

GroupMembership.description: Contains the scope of a Group.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'GroupMembership' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Scope.description: Gets or sets the scope for a Group.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'HateoasLink' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Rel.description: Gets the link relation type, describes how the current context is related to the target resource.

Type.description: Gets the expected resource media type.

IdentifiableObject.description: Abstract base class for all objects that can be identified using a "TCM URI">.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'IdentifiableObject' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
$type.example: <Set to a class name inheriting from 'IdentifiableObject'>

Id.description: Gets the identifier (TCM URI) of the object.

Title.description: Gets or sets the title (display name) of the object.

ApplicableActions.description: Gets information about the applicable actions which can be performed on the object in its current state.

ExtensionProperties.description: Gets the extension properties dictionary which may be used by extensions.Key must comply with XML NCName datatype.This value is not persisted by Content Manager Kernel.

IsEditable.description: Gets a value indicating whether the object is editable.

ListLinks.description: Gets or sets the collection of the hateoas links.

LoadInfo.description: Gets the information about the error that was thrown while loading an item.

SecurityDescriptor.description:
Gets or sets the Security Descriptor which specifies the Rights and Permissions that the current user has on this item.
A SecurityDescriptor is specific to a user and a context (IdentifiableObject).

VersionInfo.description:
Gets the version information of the object.
            Should be casted into "LimitedVersionInfo" in case of the object type is "Repository" or "RepositoryLocalObject" or 
            derived classes and into "FullVersionInfo" in case of the object type is "VersionedItem" or derived from it classes.

IdentifiableObjectDictionary.description: Represents the set of Identifiable Objects grouped by the Identifiable Object Id.

IdentityProviderGroupMapping.description: Represents the data of a mapping from an Identity Provider Group to a TCM Group.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the mapping.

Group.description: Gets or sets the Group for which the mapping exists.

IdentityProviderName.description: Gets or sets the name of the Identity Provider to match on.

ItemFieldDefinition.description: Abstract base class for Item Field Definitions (specified in a Schema)

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ItemFieldDefinition' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
$type.example: <Set to a class name inheriting from 'ItemFieldDefinition'>

CustomUrl.description: Gets or sets the custom URL of the field.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description/label of the field.

ExtensionXml.description: Gets or sets the extension XML element which can contain any custom data.

MaxOccurs.description:
Gets or sets the maximum occurrence of the field.
            The maximum occurrence specifies the maximum number of values that field may have.
            Typical occurrence values are 1 (single valued field) and -1 (multi valued field).

MinOccurs.description:
Gets or sets the minimum occurrence of the field.
            The minimum occurrence specifies the minimum number of values that the field must have.
            Typical occurrence values are 0 (optional field) and 1 (required field).

Name.description: Gets or sets the XML name of the field.

ItemPublishableFieldDefinition.description: Abstract base class for Item Field Definitions for the field types that can be published.

IsIndexable.description: Gets or sets whether this field can be indexed once published.

IsPublishable.description: Gets or sets whether this field can be published.

Keyword.description: Represents the data of a Keyword used to classify items.

Description.description: Gets or sets a description of the Keyword.

IsAbstract.description:
Gets or sets whether the Keyword is abstract.
            An abstract Keyword cannot be used to classify items with. It is merely there to act
            as a parent for other Keywords.
            This property cannot be changed in a local copy.

IsRoot.description: Gets whether the Keyword is a root Keyword (i.e. it has no parent Keywords).

Key.description:
Gets or sets a custom key for the Keyword.
            This key can be used to identify a Keyword in custom code; it has no special meaning to the TCM system.
            Unlike the Keyword's "IdentifiableObject.Title", this property cannot be changed in a local copy.

ParentKeywords.description:
Gets or sets access to the parent Keywords of this Keyword.
            Parent Keywords are used to form a Taxonomy of Keywords.
            Typically, a parent Keyword is a broader term/concept.
            The Parent Keywords must be from one of the allowed parent Categories of this Keyword's Category.

RelatedKeywords.description: Gets or sets access to the Keywords related to this Keyword.

KeywordFieldDefinition.description: Represents a Keyword field definition (in a Schema).

AllowAutoClassification.description: Specifies whether the field supports automatic classification.

Category.description: Gets or sets the Category in which the Keywords must reside.

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

List.description: Gets access to the list of allowed values.

KeywordSuggestion.description: Represents a keyword suggestion for a given source.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'KeywordSuggestion' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Frequency.description: How often the Keyword appears in the source text.

Score.description: The relevancy score for the suggested Keyword. The higher it is, the more confident the system is that the Keyword is relevant to the content.

KeywordSuggestions.description: List of suggested keywords, grouped by the URI of the category that they belong to.

LimitedVersionInfo.description: Limited version info for Repository-Local Objects.

Creator.description: Gets or sets the User who created the container object.

Link.description: Base class for links to Identifiable Objects.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'Link' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

IdRef.description: Gets or sets the TCM URI of the referenced object.

Title.description:
Gets or sets the title of the referenced object.
            The title that is used for informational purposes only.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the referenced object.

LinkDictionary.description: Represents the set of links grouped by the link definition.

LinkTargetStatus.description:
Defines Link's target status
            

Members:
* `NotFound` - 
            Target item not found
            
* `NotAvailable` - 
            Target provider is not available
            
* `NoPermission` - 
            Target item is not accessible
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

LinkWithIsEditable.description: Represents a link to an Identifiable Object with the option to set if it is allowed to edit the linked Object.

IsEditable.description: Gets or sets whether the referenced object is editable.

ListDefinition.description: Provides information about how a list of values should be represented to the user.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ListDefinition' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of the list (if applicable).

Type.description:
Gets or sets the list type (drop-down, checkboxes, radio buttons, etc.)
            If the value is "ListType.None", no allowed values are presented.

ListType.description:
Specifies the type of list used to present allowed field values.
            

Members:
* `None` - Don't present a list of allowed values.
* `Select` - Present a select list (or drop-down list if Height=1)
* `Radio` - Present radio buttons.
* `Checkbox` - Present check boxes.
* `Tree` - Present a tree (Taxonomy).
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

LoadInfo.description: Represents the information about the error that was thrown while loading an item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'LoadInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

LoadInfoState.description:
Enum of load states.
            

Members:
* `FullyLoaded` - 
            An item is fully loaded.
            
* `PartiallyLoaded` - 
            An item is partially loaded.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'LocationInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ContextRepository.description:
Gets or sets the context Repository from which the container object has been retrieved.
            For shared items, the "context Repository" and "owning Repository" will be different.

OrganizationalItem.description: Gets or sets the Organizational Item that contains the container object.

Path.description: Gets or sets the path to the item (that is, excluding the item's own title).

WebDavUrl.description: Gets or sets the WebDAV URL of the item.

LockInfo.description: Lock information about Repository Local Object.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'LockInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

LockDate.description: The date and time in UTC at which the item was locked.

LockType.description: Type of lock on the item (if any).

LockUser.description: A user who locked the item.

LockType.description:
Defines the state (lock) of an item.
            

Members:
* `None` - The item is not locked.
* `CheckedOut` - The item is checked-out. This can mean either a temporary (edit) lock, a permanent lock (explicit check-out performed by user) or a workflow lock.
* `Permanent` - The item is permanently locked, that is using an explicit lock (check-out) action. Can be applied to versioned items (permanent check-out) and to organizational items.
* `NewItem` - The item is a new item, that is it has been created, but not checked-in for the first time yet.
* `InWorkflow` - The item is in a workflow.
* `Reserved` - 
            The item is reserved by the system. This means it is checked-out/locked, but nobody owns the lock.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

ModelType.description:
Specifies the Model types that are supported by the Content Manager.
            

Members:
* `Bundle` - 
            Bundle.
            
* `SearchFolder` - 
            Search folder.
            
* `Schema` - 
            Schema.
            
* `Page` - 
            Page.
            
* `PageTemplate` - 
            Page template.
            
* `Component` - 
            Component.
            
* `ComponentTemplate` - 
            Component template.
            
* `Folder` - 
            Folder.
            
* `Keyword` - 
            Keyword.
            
* `StructureGroup` - 
            Structure group.
            
* `TemplateBuildingBlock` - 
            Template building block.
            
* `Publication` - 
            Publication.
            
* `Category` - 
            Category.
            
* `Group` - 
            Group.
            
* `ProcessDefinition` - 
            Process definition.
            
* `BusinessProcessType` - 
            Business process type.
            
* `MultimediaType` - 
            Multimedia type.
            
* `TargetType` - 
            Target type.
            
* `User` - 
            User.
            
* `TargetGroup` - 
            Target group.
            
* `ApprovalStatus` - 
            Approval status.

MultiLineTextFieldDefinition.description: Represents a multi-line text field definition (in a Schema).

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of the text area in the form-based User Interface.

MultimediaLinkFieldDefinition.description: Represents a Multimedia link field definition (in a Schema).

AllowedTargetSchemas.description:
Gets access to the allowed Schemas for the linked Multimedia Components.
            An empty list means that the target Schema is not constrained.

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

MultimediaType.description: Represents a Multimedia Type: a type of binary content

FileExtensions.description:
Gets or sets the file extensions associated with this Multimedia type.
            File extensions must be unique across all Multimedia types.

MimeType.description: Gets or sets the MIME type according to IETF RFC 2046.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'NestedRegion' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

IsMandatory.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this nested schema is mandatory or optional.If not specified, default value is true.

RegionName.description: Gets or sets the name of the nested region.

RegionSchema.description: Gets or sets the expandable link to region schema that is used to validate nested region.

NumberFieldDefinition.description: Represents a number field definition (in a Schema).

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

FractionDigits.description:
Gets or sets the constraints on the number of fraction digits.
            If only integer values are allowed, this constraint should be set to 0.

IsMaxValueExclusive.description: Gets or sets whether the specified maximum value is exclusive or inclusive.

IsMinValueExclusive.description: Gets or sets whether the specified minimum value is exclusive or inclusive.

List.description: Gets access to the list of allowed values.

MaxValue.description: Gets or sets the maximum value constraint.

MinValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value constraint.

Pattern.description: Gets or sets a regular expression pattern to constrain the value.

TotalDigits.description: Gets or sets the constraint on the total number of digits.

NumberListDefinition.description: Provides information about whether/how to present a list of allowed number field values.

Entries.description: Gets access to the list of allowed values.

NumericalConditionOperator.description:
Defines the operator used for comparison of numerical operands.
            

Members:
* `Equals` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is equal to the given condition value.
            
* `GreaterThan` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is greater than the given condition value.
            
* `LessThan` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is less than the given condition value.
            
* `NotEqual` - 
            Compares if a numerical operand is not equal to the given condition value.
            
* `UnknownByClient` - 
            Special reserved value used to notify an older API version client about the presence of an enumeration member added in a later API version.
            Explicitly setting this value by a client is not allowed, but client code should check it and be able to handle such cases.

OccurrenceConstraint.description: Represents an occurrence constraint for Component Presentation(s) in a Region Schema.

MaxOccurs.description:
Gets or sets the maximum number of Component Presentation(s) in the Region.
            The maximum occurrence specifies the maximum number of Component Presentation(s) that the Region may have.
